title: BRIEF-Colgate-Palmolive Says CEO Ian Cook's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $15.3 Mln
text:
March 28, 2018 / 8:35 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Colgate-Palmolive Says CEO Ian Cook's FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $15.3 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
March 28 (Reuters) - Colgate-Palmolive Co: 
* COLGATE-PALMOLIVE CO SAYS CEO IAN COOKâ€™S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $15.3 MILLION VERSUS $14.7 MILLION IN FY 2016 - SEC FILING 
* COLGATE-PALMOLIVE CO SAYS CFO DENNIS HICKEY'S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $6.4 MILLION VERSUS $6.8 MILLION IN FY 2016 Source text: ( bit.ly/2GgjE91 ) Further company coverage:
